name: Affogato
details: A shot of espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Cappuccino
details: Espresso with steamed milk and milk foam.

name: Cold Brew
details: Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period.

name: Espresso
details: A strong coffee brewed by forcing steam through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Fappuccino
details: A blended beverage of coffee with milk and ice.

name: Iced Latte
details: Espresso with cold milk served over ice.

name: Macchiato
details: Espresso with a small amount of frothed milk.

name: Macho
details: A strong drink made with espresso and steamed milk.
